DOC.brief_summary: Project CONNECT ( `` Community-based Organizations Neighborhood Network : Enhancing Capacity Together '' ) randomize control trial involve 22 community-based organization ( CBOs ) locate Baltimore , MD . Half organization randomly assign intervention group use constrain cluster randomization process . The remain 11 part control intervention group . The intervention co-developed set IT tool hypothesize improve connection among intervention CBOs , Johns Hopkins health care facility CBO client .
DOC.brief_title: Reverse Innovation Patient Engagement Improve Quality Care Patient Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Community Based Organization ; 501C3 status ; Located within zip code surround Johns Hopkins Hospital Johns Hopkins Bayview Medical Center ; Provides direct service client Part Johns Hopkins Medicine Baltimore City Agency
